film.title: Applying Colours
film.description: A short film where layers of colours are applied to a monochrome landscape, mutating it into an abstract, digital canvas. Available for free on Vimeo.

film.title: The Exhibition Shaded Into a Vast Amusement Park
film.description: A short film in which abstract imagery is paired with a story about a singer. Available for free on Vimeo.

film.title: Fish & Soos
film.description: A collaborative film by Connor Kurtz and Jesus Perez which documents an eight week video exchange. Available for free on Vimeo.

film.title: Appearing
film.description: A short film which deals with the appearance and disappearance of images. Available for free on Vimeo.

film.title: A Digital Triptych
film.description: Three nine-minute films which use structured computer algorithms to create their images. Available for free as an HQ download or on Vimeo.

film.title: Vehicles in Transit
film.description: A short film which uses vehicles and commuters to show the progress of a South Ontario winter. Available for free on Vimeo.

film.title: Music at 5,000 Hz
film.description: An abstract film captured on a cellphone set to music at 5,000 Hz. Available for free on Vimeo.
